00020 
00049 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_NEQ_H
00050 #define CONSTRAINT_NEQ_H
00051 
00052 template<typename VarArray>
00053 struct NeqConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00054 {
00055   virtual string constraint_name()
00056   { return "Neq"; }
00057   
00058   //typedef BoolLessSumConstraint<VarArray, VarSum,1-VarToCount> NegConstraintType;
00059   typedef typename VarArray::value_type VarRef;
00060   
00061   VarArray var_array;
00062   
00063   NeqConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, const VarArray& _var_array) : AbstractConstraint(_stateObj),
00064     var_array(_var_array)
00065   { }
00066   
00067   virtual triggerCollection setup_internal()
00068   {
00069     triggerCollection t;
00070     int array_size = var_array.size();
00071     for(int i = 0; i < array_size; ++i)
00072       t.push_back(make_trigger(var_array[i], Trigger(this, i), Assigned));
00073     return t;
00074   }
00075   
00076   virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint()
00077   { return new CheckAssignConstraint<VarArray, NeqConstraint>(stateObj, var_array, *this); }
00078   
00079   virtual void propagate(int prop_val, DomainDelta)
00080   {
00081     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(ArrayNeq);
00082     DomainInt remove_val = var_array[prop_val].getAssignedValue();
00083     int array_size = var_array.size();
00084     for(int i = 0; i < array_size; ++i)
00085     {
00086       if(i != prop_val)
00087       {
00088         if(var_array[i].isBound())
00089         {
00090           if(var_array[i].getMin() == remove_val)
00091             var_array[i].setMin(remove_val + 1);
00092           if(var_array[i].getMax() == remove_val)
00093             var_array[i].setMax(remove_val - 1);
00094         }
00095         else {
00096           var_array[i].removeFromDomain(remove_val);
00097         }
00098       }
00099     }
00100     
00101   }
00102   
00103   virtual BOOL full_check_unsat()
00104   { 
00105     int v_size = var_array.size();
00106     for(int i = 0; i < v_size; ++i)
00107     {
00108       if(var_array[i].isAssigned())
00109       {
00110       
00111         for(int j = i + 1; j < v_size; ++j)
00112         {
00113           if(var_array[j].isAssigned())
00114           {
00115             if(var_array[i].getAssignedValue() == var_array[j].getAssignedValue())
00116               return true;
00117           }
00118         }
00119         
00120       }
00121     }
00122     
00123     return false;
00124   }
00125   
00126   virtual BOOL check_unsat(int i, DomainDelta)
00127   {
00128     int v_size = var_array.size();
00129     D_ASSERT(var_array[i].isAssigned());
00130     DomainInt assign_val = var_array[i].getAssignedValue();
00131     for(int loop = 0; loop < v_size; ++loop)
00132     {
00133       if(loop != i)
00134       {
00135         if(var_array[loop].isAssigned() && 
00136            var_array[loop].getAssignedValue() == assign_val)
00137         return true;
00138       }
00139     }
00140     return false;
00141   }
00142   
00143   
00144   virtual void full_propagate()
00145   {
00146     int array_size = var_array.size();
00147     for(int i = 0; i < array_size; ++i)
00148       if(var_array[i].isAssigned())
00149       {
00150         DomainInt remove_val = var_array[i].getAssignedValue();
00151         for(int j = 0; j < array_size;++j)
00152         {
00153           if(i != j)
00154           {
00155             if(var_array[j].isBound())
00156             {
00157               if(var_array[j].getMin() == remove_val)
00158                 var_array[j].setMin(remove_val + 1);
00159               if(var_array[j].getMax() == remove_val)
00160                 var_array[j].setMax(remove_val - 1);
00161             }
00162             else {
00163               var_array[j].removeFromDomain(remove_val);
00164             }
00165           }
00166         }
00167       }
00168   }
00169     
00170     virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00171     {
00172       D_ASSERT(v_size == var_array.size());
00173       int array_size = v_size;
00174       for(int i=0;i<array_size;i++)
00175         for( int j=i+1;j<array_size;j++)
00176           if(v[i]==v[j]) return false;
00177       return true;
00178     }
00179     
00180     virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00181     {
00182       vector<AnyVarRef> vars;
00183       vars.reserve(var_array.size());
00184       for(unsigned i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00185         vars.push_back(var_array[i]);
00186       return vars;
00187     }
00188     
00189     
00190      // Getting a satisfying assignment here is too hard, we don't want to have to
00191      // build a matching.
00192      virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00193    {
00194      MAKE_STACK_BOX(c, DomainInt, var_array.size());
00195      
00196      for(int i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00197      {
00198        if(!var_array[i].isAssigned()) 
00199        {  
00200          assignment.push_back(make_pair(i, var_array[i].getMin()));
00201          assignment.push_back(make_pair(i, var_array[i].getMax()));
00202          return true;
00203        }
00204        else
00205          c.push_back(var_array[i].getAssignedValue());
00206      }
00207     
00208     if(check_assignment(c.begin(), c.size()))
00209     {  // Put the complete assignment in the box.
00210       for(int i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00211         assignment.push_back(make_pair(i, c[i])); 
00212       return true;
00213     }
00214     return false;
00215    }
00216    
00217    
00218   };
00219 
00220 template<typename VarArray>
00221 AbstractConstraint*
00222 BuildCT_ALLDIFF(StateObj* stateObj, const VarArray& var_array, ConstraintBlob&)
00223 { return new NeqConstraint<VarArray>(stateObj, var_array); }
00224 
00225 #endif
